programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 10108664, Title: The Disappearance of Susan Cox Powell, --- Description: The Disappearance of Susan Cox Powell: With Stephanie Bauer, Jennifer Graves, Josh Skurnik, Kirk Graves. Susan Powell was just 28 years-old when she vanished from her suburban home in West Valley City, Utah in 2009." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10108664/","name":"The Disappearance of Susan Cox Powell","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWJjNWE4MTQtOWE2NS00ZWJiLWJjNDUtNjI5Y2NmMDI2MDdhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzk1MzU0MzQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Susan Powell was just 28 years-old when she vanished from her suburban home in West Valley City, Utah in 2009.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10108664/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"rdoubleoc","dateCreated":"2019-05-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Oxygen at it's finest.","reviewBody":"I had never heard of this case before now, but have watched a lot of Oxygen's real-life crime shows, and this one was just as good.\n\nThey do a really good job of showing the whole picture (the thing news articles don't really do a good job of). programme.title: Sibyl
Sybilla
Sibyl
programme.desc:
Sibyl: Directed by Justine Triet. With Virginie Efira, Adèle Exarchopoulos, Gaspard Ulliel, Sandra Hüller. A jaded psychotherapist returns to her first passion of becoming a writer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9173264/","name":"Sibyl","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDY3MmQ3NzMtYTUxMi00ZWQzLThjNmYtNmE5MjUyYTU1MGRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A jaded psychotherapist returns to her first passion of becoming a writer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9173264/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"humate80"},"dateCreated":"2021-06-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Mulholland rue","reviewBody":"It could be a kind of french Mulholland Drive. The materials where there: the affections of the past, the psychological insight, the fiction inside the fiction, fantasies, memories...

A failed writer retakes her old dream to write a beautiful novel, but her lacks of inspiration block her... until she met an actress, who tells her about her troubles. Quickly Sibyl sees a paralelism with her past, about her frustrated love with a man that bring her a passion and then another trauma related with a son they had. Sibyl lost her literal aspirations and her love and in ten years she discovered herself having a life that is safe, with some client as therapist and a husband that gives her estability. But none of these are now valid items to her.

The materials, as I said are good, but by one side the dialogue is too melodramatic, sometimes the scenes turns cartoonish and melodrama doesn't fits very well with the tone of the film, a psychologial drama. The scenes are also too repetitive, once we understand her old past love was very passionate, we don't need three more scenes of kissing and stuff.

By other side, the other characters, aside form Sibyl, doesn't feel with depth, something is missing with all of them.

A jaded psychotherapist returns to her first passion of becoming a writer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9173264/","name":"Sibyl","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDY3MmQ3NzMtYTUxMi00ZWQzLThjNmYtNmE5MjUyYTU1MGRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A jaded psychotherapist returns to her first passion of becoming a writer.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9173264/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"humate80","dateCreated":"2021-06-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Mulholland rue","reviewBody":"It could be a kind of french Mulholland Drive. The materials where there: the affections of the past, the psychological insight, the fiction inside the fiction, fantasies, memories...

A failed writer retakes her old dream to write a beautiful novel, but her lacks of inspiration block her... until she met an actress, who tells her about her troubles. Quickly Sibyl sees a paralelism with her past, about her frustrated love with a man that bring her a passion and then another trauma related with a son they had. Sibyl lost her literal aspirations and her love and in ten years she discovered herself having a life that is safe, with some client as therapist and a husband that gives her estability. But none of these are now valid items to her.

The materials, as I said are good, but by one side the dialogue is too melodramatic, sometimes the scenes turns cartoonish and melodrama doesn't fits very well with the tone of the film, a psychologial drama. The scenes are also too repetitive, once we understand her old past love was very passionate, we don't need three more scenes of kissing and stuff.

By other side, the other characters, aside form Sibyl, doesn't feel with depth, something is missing with all of them.

It's a pity, because the idea is very good. programme.desc: 52-letnia Taina (Tiina Pirhonen) przygotowuje się na idealny weekend z rodziną, ponieważ jej syn Eetu (Paavo Kinnunen) odwiedza ją ze swoją dziewczyną. programme.title: Dzień jak co dzień
programme.desc: Ania z córką Basią jadą na casting do telewizyjnego talent show. Z dziewczynką zaczyna dziać się coś dziwnego, ale matka tego nie zauważa. Podczas występu Basia wybiega ze sceny. Ania musi zmierzyć się ze swoimi kompleksami, by dostrzec i zrozumieć potrzeby córki.

programme.title: Breaking Surface
Pod powierzchnią
Breaking Surface
programme.desc: Breaking Surface: Directed by Joachim Hedén. With Moa Gammel, Madeleine Martin, Trine Wiggen, Jitse Jonathan Buitnik. A winter diving trip in Norway turns into a desperate race against time for two sisters when one of them becomes trapped at the bottom of the ocean by falling rocks." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10081762/","name":"Breaking Surface","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA5YzNhMjgtZGEyZi00Nzg5LWE1ZTUtYzc1ZmMyMWNmOTMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAzNDgzMjU1._V1_.jpg","description":"A winter diving trip in Norway turns into a desperate race against time for two sisters when one of them becomes trapped at the bottom of the ocean by falling rocks.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10081762/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"papelindholm"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dramatic? Yes. Realistic? no.","reviewBody":"Initially bad decisions lead eventually to bad solutions - as the theme of any script based on creating suspense works as it is. To further on claim it pictures reality on any level among experienced professional divers is hogwash and is quite telling about the asserted "skill" and "knowledge" in the field of the writer comparing this to an actual possible scenario. Any diver - professional or amateur - shouldn't be diving at all if this is their conception of events that even could occur during any dive if thoroughly planned and implemented properly. Rather consider this as but a movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3671,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-02-14","keywords":"ocean,survival,sister sister relationship,decompression sickness,isolation","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Breaking Surface","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi197181721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2ZhYTJiYjgtMWUzNi00MTE5LWFlZjAtNzY5N2YxNDM2ZjM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2ZhYTJiYjgtMWUzNi00MTE5LWFlZjAtNzY5N2YxNDM2ZjM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0303973/","name":"Moa Gammel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4477198/","name":"Madeleine Martin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0927740/","name":"Trine Wiggen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1893652/","name":"Joachim Hedén"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174784/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0305542/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0059852/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1893652/","name":"Joachim Hedén"}],"duration":"PT1H22M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Maja
programme.desc: Maja (Selena Marsenic), sześcioletnia Serbka, przeprowadza się wraz z rodzicami do Danii. Jest nieco onieśmielona i wiele elementów codziennego dnia jest dla niej niezrozumiałych. Szczególnie utrudniona jest jej relacja z innymi dziećmi.

credits.actor: Jesper Christensen
Dejan Cukic
Marijana Jankovic
Selena Marsenic
Elias Munk

programme.title: II koncert na wiolonczelę i orkiestrę
programme.desc: Pasją okulisty Macieja Gasika jest muzyka. W trakcie jednego z koncertów mężczyzna doznaje udaru mózgu. Staje się więźniem własnego ciała. Postanawia się nie poddawać i zawalczyć o swoją godność oraz wolność. Film na podstawie prawdziwej historii. Scenariusz stworzono do koncertu wiolonczelowego Pawła Mykietyna.

programme.title: Czas niedźwiedzia
L'Heure de l'ours
programme.desc: Silne więzi łączące chłopca i jego matkę są zagrożone, gdy pewnej nocy rodzinę odwiedza tajemniczy nieznajomy. Wówczas dochodzi do kolizji między wpojonym wychowaniem a naturą.

credits.actor: Ron Dyens
Nadine Buss
Quentin Romanet
Agnès Patron
Manon Messiant
Gabrielle d'Andrimont
Mathias Chaumet

programme.title: Les ailes de la colombe
Skrzydła gołębicy
Les ailes de la colombe
programme.desc: Les ailes de la colombe: Directed by Benoît Jacquot. With Isabelle Huppert, Dominique Sanda, Michele Placido, Loleh Bellon. A mature lady approaches a young actor and offers him a great amount of money to get acquainted with her lonely daughter, who suffers of an incurable illness. Eventually a true romance emerges, as mother has secret feelings for the man, while he truly falls in love with the daughter. After the expected death of the daughter, the man leaves in grief rejecting the money, and the mature woman stays in deep loneliness, trying to cope with a double loss." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0155479/","name":"Les ailes de la colombe","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDVjMTYzYTYtNmJlOS00NmNjLTg1YWEtOWUyZTUyOTM2YTRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzU0NzkwMDg@._V1_.jpg","description":"A mature lady approaches a young actor and offers him a great amount of money to get acquainted with her lonely daughter, who suffers of an incurable illness. programme.title: Vox Lux
Vox Lux
programme.desc: Vox Lux: Directed by Brady Corbet. With Natalie Portman, Jude Law, Stacy Martin, Jennifer Ehle. An unusual set of circumstances brings unexpected success to a pop star." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5960374/","name":"Vox Lux","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU2YjVhNjMtMGQ4ZC00ZmUyLWJlZjAtNTgyZjhjZmQwNWUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An unusual set of circumstances brings unexpected success to a pop star.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5960374/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bastille-852-731547"},"dateCreated":"2018-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Interesting, Artsy Drama Headlined by Natalie Portman","reviewBody":"The reviews and trailer for this film promised a strong performance by Natalie Portman as a troubled pop star. While some of the praise for her role in "Vox Lux" may be somewhat overhyped, she does give a generally good performance in this drama directed by Brady Corbet. She plays Celeste, a now-famous pop star who survived a school shooting in 1999. The film gives viewers a grip on how those who get too all-consumed in the superficiality of pop music culture can lose control over their lives, although sometimes the dialogue and writing during these scenes can sometimes feel almost too on-the-nose to be truly impactful on the viewer.\n\nThe film is stunningly shot, and its score is often stirring and potent. Jude Law's supporting performance is outstanding, providing a powerfully subdued complement to the main narrative as Celeste's manager. With the exception of the memorial song sung by a young Celeste at a vigil for the shooting victims about ten minutes after film's commencement, the rest of the film's songs (which are pop-based) are generally not too appealing. However, this is likely intentional, as Corbet's direction is intended to make the viewer critique popular culture and its effects on music and society, as well as the possibility that our social obsessions may breed tragic and wretched acts. Despite such potentially-thoughtful commentary, it's not clear by the end of the film what Corbet really wants to say or offer as a message to the narrative besides simply saying that excess tackiness is bad. While superficiality is an important topic, for a film that poses far deeper, existential and angst-filled questions, the film's attempts to thread loose ends of its messaging before the film's finale (a pop concert) feel somewhat skimpy. The film's stronger elements would make it worth of recommending to those who like Natalie Portman and can appreciate sometimes-audacious and challenging films. 7/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":17514,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2018-12-20","keywords":"pop star,year 1999,year 2017,pop star as protagonist,terrorist attack","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3788683801","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDM0ZDQ5YmItZDlmNC00OGI3LWFlMzItMjVmNzU2ZDM1NWQ5XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDM0ZDQ5YmItZDlmNC00OGI3LWFlMzItMjVmNzU2ZDM1NWQ5XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"'Vox Lux' begins in 1999 when teenage sisters Celeste (Raffey Cassidy) and Eleanor (Stacy Martin) survive a seismic, violent tragedy. The sisters compose and perform a song about their experience, making something lovely and cathartic out of catastrophe - while also catapulting Celeste to stardom. By 2017, the now 31-year-old Celeste (Natalie Portman) is mother to a teenage daughter of her own and struggling to navigate a career fraught with scandals when another act of terrifying violence demands her attention."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000204/","name":"Natalie Portman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000179/","name":"Jude Law"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5237479/","name":"Stacy Martin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1227232/","name":"Brady Corbet"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0135575/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030755/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0032488/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1227232/","name":"Brady Corbet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2178754/","name":"Mona Fastvold"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dialog
programme.desc: Cykl prezentujący wyselekcjonowany zbiór najlepszych filmów krótkometrażowych. Wiele z nich nagrodzonych zostało prestiżowymi wyróżnieniami na międzynarodowych galach i festiwalach filmowych. Każde pasmo przedstawia kilka produkcji na dany temat.

programme.title: Hi, How Are You
programme.desc: Bezrobotny pięćdziesięcioletni Sławek (Jacek Poniedziałek) ma problem z zabiciem wolnego czasu. Mężczyzna przesiaduje w domu bądź włóczy się po osiedlu, szukając zaginionego kota. W najlepszym razie wykonuje różnego rodzaju prace zlecone mu przez żonę. Pewnego dnia Sławek poznaje tajemniczą sąsiadkę Kamilę (Maja Szopa). Kobieta zaprasza go do swojego ogrodu.

Maja Szopa

programme.title: Sufit
Katto
programme.desc: Olavi (Juho Milonoff) się rozwodzi. Szukając zapomnienia od związanych z tym nieprzyjemnych okoliczności, przyjeżdża do letniego domku. Na miejscu się przekonuje, że sufit w tajemniczy sposób się obniżył.

programme.title: Babyteeth
Zaraza
Ill: Final Contagium
programme.desc:
Babyteeth: Directed by Shannon Murphy. With Eliza Scanlen, Michelle Lotters, Toby Wallace, Sora Wakaki. Milla, a seriously ill teenager, falls in love with a drug dealer, Moses, her parents' worst nightmare." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8399664/","name":"Babyteeth","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGRhMzRkYzEtMDBjNy00YjkxLWJjNzctNzEwNGNhZDUyZWI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MzI2NzIz._V1_.jpg","description":"Milla, a seriously ill teenager, falls in love with a drug dealer, Moses, her parents' worst nightmare.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8399664/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"evanston_dad"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well Acted But Very Depressing","reviewBody":"Well acted but very depressing.

Eliza Scanlan gives a fascinating performance as a young woman who's going through cancer treatment and falls for a drug addict who may or may not be good for her. Her parents (Essie Davis and Ben Mendelsohn) are dysfunctional and unraveling and have drug problems of their own. They don't like her daughter's boyfriend and under normal circumstances probably wouldn't tolerate him. But he's the only thing that brings their daughter some respite from the hell she's going through, so they sort of adopt him as their own.

"Babyteeth" is a coming of age movie that's set apart from others like it because of the protagonist's existential crisis. Scanlan's character is as immature in some ways as any sixteen year old, but at the same time is being asked to summon up reserves of maturity to deal with the ultimate curve ball life has to throw at us. How do you balance the emotional and hormonal ups and downs of teen romance with the possibility of your impending death?

The film is a bit monotonous in tone and starts to feel like a grind after a while. But again, it's worth seeing for the performances and for the unsentimental treatment of the subject matter that would have possibly segued into the maudlin in different hands. The ending scene is the most devastating thing I've seen in a movie this year.

Grade: B+","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14022,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"MA-17","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2020-07-23","keywords":"pills,dog,teenage girl loses her hair,teenage girl wears a wig,hospital","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Babyteeth","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi678936601","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzM2ODA5ZDItMjJjMS00ZTYxLTk3ODItOTNiMGEwZGQ2NzNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzM2ODA5ZDItMjJjMS00ZTYxLTk3ODItOTNiMGEwZGQ2NzNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7340546/","name":"Eliza Scanlen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9334013/","name":"Michelle Lotters"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3108675/","name":"Toby Wallace"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2221724/","name":"Shannon Murphy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0234956/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0658237/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017733/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1514808/","name":"Rita Kalnejais"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

The ending scene is the most devastating thing I've seen in a movie this year.

programme.title: Planta permanente
Kafeteria
Planta permanente
programme.desc:
Planta permanente: Directed by Ezequiel Radusky. With Liliana Juárez, Rosario Bléfari, Verónica Perrotta, Nina Vera Suárez Bléfari. Lila and Marcela have always worked on the cleaning staff of a state office. They know its nooks and crannies better than anyone, and have found a way to support themselves - and a dream - running a clandestine kitchen in an abandoned corner of the building. But times change: a new director arrives, spouting cynical speeches full of clichés with a fistful of empty promises. The kitchen is closed and a wave of redundancies disrupts the precarious equilibrium in the office, making everyday tasks a struggle for survival." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11306358/","name":"Planta permanente","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjE2ZDkyZjItYWIwMC00YmE0LTlmZTgtYWNiMWQ5ZGZhNTE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDUwMDg1ODU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lila and Marcela have always worked on the cleaning staff of a state office. They know its nooks and crannies better than anyone, and have found a way to support themselves - and a dream - running a clandestine kitchen in an abandone","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11306358/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"danybur"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"A film that presents us with the centrality of work and its impact on ties","reviewBody":"Lila and Marcela (Liliana Juárez and Rosario Bléfari, in her last film role) are old friends and have been working for years as cleaning personnel in a provincial Public Works Department. Also a long time ago and as I searched, both run a dining room in an unoccupied sector of the building to which most of the employees willingly attend. The arrival of a new Director (Verónica Perrota), who recalls the speech and the ways of a recent and prominent governor, calls into question the job security of the staff and the continuity of the dining room.

What is disturbing about this film by Ezequiel Radusky is the chronicle of how the variation of the status quo takes the unexpected path of undermining the relationship of both friends and partners. On the other hand, the movements of Lila (a true entrepreneur) to preserve or reconvert her irregular "undertaking" against all odds are moving. Impossible not to love her after the remarkable performance of Liliana Juárez, winner of the award for best actress for this role at the last Mar del Plata Film Festival.

The harshness of some situations are resolved with the best resource: humor, in an arduous film in several senses.

In short, a film that presents us with the centrality of work (in situations that are not exclusive to public employment) and its impact on ties and to what extent individual resistance to power and adverse changes is a possible path or a trap.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":160,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-11-15","keywords":"work,cleaning lady,cleaning,new director,friendship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Tráiler [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2604449817","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWFhMjY5MTYtNDUwMC00Y2U1LWEzYmMtZjA4ZTc0MDIyNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWFhMjY5MTYtNDUwMC00Y2U1LWEzYmMtZjA4ZTc0MDIyNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4989891/","name":"Liliana Juárez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0088164/","name":"Rosario Bléfari"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1213740/","name":"Verónica Perrotta"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4991308/","name":"Ezequiel Radusky"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250991/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0202630/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1195308/","name":"Diego Lerman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4991308/","name":"Ezequiel Radusky"}],"duration":"PT1H18M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Love in the Forecast: Directed by Christie Will Wolf. With Cindy Busby, Christopher Russell, Donna Benedicto, Ryan McDonell. After swearing off dating for a full year, Leah quickly learns her new commitment has made her a magnet for men." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11836852/","name":"Love in the Forecast","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWQ0ZTQ2OGItNTQ4NS00YzMwLTk0Y2QtOTVlZjViZThlNTIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3ODk4OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"After swearing off dating for a full year, Leah quickly learns her new commitment has made her a magnet for men.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11836852/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"elliep-46475"},"dateCreated":"2020-06-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Eek","reviewBody":"If anyone needs a meteorology-themed Hallmark movie, check out Cloudy with a Chance of Love. programme.title: Source Code
Kod nieśmiertelności
Source Code
programme.desc: Source Code: Directed by Duncan Jones. With Jake Gyllenhaal, Michelle Monaghan, Vera Farmiga, Jeffrey Wright. A soldier wakes up in someone else's body and discovers he's part of an experimental government program to find the bomber of a commuter train within 8 minutes." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0945513/","name":"Source Code","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0MTc3MzMzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDE4MjE0NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A soldier wakes up in someone else's body and discovers he's part of an experimental government program to find the bomber of a commuter train within 8 minutes.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0945513/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rick-98899"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nailbiting....","reviewBody":"I love this movie and have rewatched it a few times over the years. Duncan Jones has impressed with other offerings such as Moon and Warcraft and I look forward to his future ventures. Jake Gyllenhaal (another favourite) plays the protaganist brilliantly and the angst, apprehension and despair that he portrays while trying to figure out Source Code is palpable. Although the premise is far fetched, the characters are relatable - which is why we watch movies right?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":502928,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2011-04-01","keywords":"train,time loop,bomber,memory,reliving same event","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Source Code: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3948911129","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2MTQ4Nzg4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTcxMjQ1NA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2MTQ4Nzg4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTcxMjQ1NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An action thriller centered on a soldier who wakes up in the body of an unknown man and discovers he's part of a mission to find the bomber of a Chicago commuter train."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0350453/","name":"Jake Gyllenhaal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1157358/","name":"Michelle Monaghan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0267812/","name":"Vera Farmiga"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1512910/","name":"Duncan Jones"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0251081/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1618286/","name":"Ben Ripley"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Krajina ve stínu
Kraina cienia
Krajina ve stínu
programme.desc: Krajina ve stínu: Directed by Bohdan Sláma. With Magdaléna Borová, Csongor Kassai, Stanislav Majer, Robert Miklus. How to reconcile with killings committed by your own neighbors? How to face growing evil that nobody stands against? programme.title: The Lost Son
Zaginiony syn
The Lost Son
programme.desc:
The Lost Son: Directed by Chris Menges. With Daniel Auteuil, Nastassja Kinski, Katrin Cartlidge, Marianne Denicourt. Xavier Lombard is a world-weary private eye in London, in exile from his native Paris; his best friend is Nathalie, a high-class call girl. He gets a call from an old friend from the Paris police department, now a businessman whose brother-in-law is missing. The missing man's parents hire Xavier over their daughter's objections, and quickly he finds himself in the realm of children's sexual slavery. He guesses that the lost son is dead and shifts his focus to finding and breaking this lucrative business of child trafficking. He involves a reluctant Nathalie to hunt "the Austrian," the shadowy head of the business. Violence erupts quickly, and Xavier soon has little more to lose." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0144286/","name":"The Lost Son","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzE5MjE2ODUwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODgwNjcxMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Xavier Lombard is a world-weary private eye in London, in exile from his native Paris; his best friend is Nathalie, a high-class call girl. He gets a call from an old friend from the Paris police department, now a businessman whose b","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0144286/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"angelwild18"},"dateCreated":"2007-04-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"An excellent "Flic" - French Cop-Style Thriller","reviewBody":"I just watched this film on DVD, and sought it out because I love Daniel Auteil's acting.

This film felt very French to me in its cinematography and overall styling, although largely London based, and shot mainly in English. 

The acting throughout was excellent, perhaps with the exception of Ciaran Hinds' Brazilian/American/Irish accent! Ciaran plays the lost son's brother in law, who brings Lombard, the French private detective living in London, in to try to solve the case of the disappearance.

The film does deal with a very sensitive subject, but I felt it did so sensitively, showing how an empire can be brought down by one man, if he feels strongly enough to sacrifice everything he has.

There are some very violent scenes, and they are wholly central to the script, highlighting how low Lombard's character, is brought by his passion and anger at what horrors he has uncovered in a paedophile ring, involved in the disappearance of the lost son. Lombard makes moral decisions throughout the film that are understandable and I feel that this is a very powerful film.

The late Katrin Cartlidge puts in a very strong performance, supporting Lombard's character in his ultimate revenge plot. Lombard's "tart with a heart" best friend, Marianne Denicourt, is excellent in a stunning bitter-sweet role, and Billie Whitelaw is fabulous as the stern, businesslike matriarch, whose lost son is being sought by Lombard, and who also comes to terms with tragic loss, as Lombard also must. Auteuil, as always, is credible, beautiful and gives a very moving performance. Although it took me a few minutes to get over his English "voice"!

In my opinion, this must be one of the best international, cross-over, thrillers in recent years.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1488,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1999-04-21","keywords":"private investigator,pedophilia,boy,sexual abuse,child prostitution","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000809/","name":"Daniel Auteuil"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000176/","name":"Nastassja Kinski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001020/","name":"Katrin Cartlidge"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0579580/","name":"Chris Menges"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103757/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103532/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0496226/","name":"Eric Leclere"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112127/","name":"Margaret Leclere"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0590105/","name":"Mark Mills"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Mimic
Mutant
Mimic
programme.desc:
Mimic: Directed by Guillermo del Toro. With Mira Sorvino, Jeremy Northam, Alexander Goodwin, Giancarlo Giannini. Three years ago, entomologist Dr. Susan Tyler genetically created an insect to kill cockroaches carrying a virulent disease. Now, the insects are out to destroy their only predator, mankind." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119675/","name":"Mimic","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk4MjRkODctOTVjNS00MmI2LTg0Y2ItMWQyMzdkZDU3MzMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three years ago, entomologist Dr. Susan Tyler genetically created an insect to kill cockroaches carrying a virulent disease. Now, the insects are out to destroy their only predator, mankind.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119675/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bob the moo"},"dateCreated":"2002-01-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dark and atmospheric horror","reviewBody":"In New York a disease carried by cockroaches threatens to wipe out a whole generation of children. A scientist, Susan Tyler, breeds a new bug that mimics the cockroach and wipes out the disease. However years later something is living in New York's subways that looks human. Tyler suspects that her breed has not died out but has evolved to imitate it's natural predator - us. Her investigations into the subway lead her to more than she bargained for.

This is an atmospheric thriller from Guillermo del Toro, director of The Devil's Backbone and Cronos. He manages to mix great director with good old fashioned monster horror to great effect. The concept itself is clever, even if the idea of bugs evolving to look very like humans is a little far fetched. However, once the action moves to the subway the fact that the bugs are clearly lethal no matter what they look like, makes this less important. The film is quite short and makes the action come quicker and seem more urgent. Several people get killed by the bug that wouldn't usually get killed in this sort of horror (children for example), this is very effective as it is quite scary to see the unexpected happen.

The mood is dark throughout and Del Toro uses the sewers and subway to great effect, creating a real sense of claustrophobia - like the humans have entered the bug's world and not the other way round. The bugs are shown early on in the film - usually not a good idea (keep it hidden in the Jaws way), but here the special effects are good enough to make the bug really believable. However the horror is not in seeing the bugs but in they way they hunt and kill - the fear is in what could happen. That's why seeing them doesn't take anything away.

The cast are great, Sorvino especially is very good in the lead. Jeremy Northam and Charles S. Dutton are good in support and Abraham Murray adds a bit of cameo class (though his role is quite unnecessary). But the director is the real star adding some genuine scares and real mood to a film that could have easily been just another creature-feature that goes straight to video and straight to the back of your mind.

Overall a superior creature horror film."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":48689,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"1997-08-22","keywords":"giant insect,insect,disease,entomologist,cockroach","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Mimic","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3387923993","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmMyYmE4YzktNWMwMy00NmVkLThiMDQtYTU0Yzc4OTc1N2IyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmMyYmE4YzktNWMwMy00NmVkLThiMDQtYTU0Yzc4OTc1N2IyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000227/","name":"Mira Sorvino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000562/","name":"Jeremy Northam"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0329422/","name":"Alexander Goodwin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0868219/","name":"Guillermo del Toro"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0938586/","name":"Donald A. Wollheim"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0730422/","name":"Matthew Robbins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0868219/","name":"Guillermo del Toro"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Shooting for Socrates
Strzał dla Sokratesa
Shooting for Socrates
programme.desc:
Shooting for Socrates: Directed by James Erskine. With John Hannah, Conleth Hill, Richard Dormer, Art Parkinson. In November 1985, the troubled streets of Belfast are torn up by rioting yet again. In amongst the angry mob, we find nine year old Tommy, nonchalantly dribbling a ball through the insanity. Whilst politicians argue over the peace process, there's only one thing on young Tommy's football-mad mind - the forthcoming World Cup, where Northern Ireland will take on Brazil. For the South American giants it's just another step on the path to inevitable global domination, yet for Northern Ireland, and young Tommy, it's the biggest game of their lives. They are two countries that couldn't seem further apart: Northern Ireland, with its Orange men and Republican curbstones, the Rev'd Ian Paisley and Fergal Sharkey; and Brazil with its carnival, its Samba, with Pelé and the 'beautiful game'. On the football field, eccentric Northern Ireland coach Billy Bingham (they call him Mr FIFA - "a fee for this and a fee for that") must plug together a bunch of misfits and third divisioners. Brazil are led by none other than the philosopher-captain (Dr.) Sócrates, who has, in part, inspired the collapse of his country's ruthless military junta, and they are the hot favourites to scoop up football's ultimate prize. As bunting replaces bombs on the streets of Belfast, and Catholic and Protestants alike turn their attention to the big match, Tommy's dockworker turned philosopher father Arthur uses his son's passion for football to enlighten him on the events that make up his chaotic world. The story interweaves young Tommy's coming of age tale with the trials and travails of the hapless Northern Irish team over the nine months leading up to their ultimate game, in the stifling heat of Mexico at the world's greatest festival of football. As the hours tick down to the ultimate battle, with his lead striker crocked, Bingham is forced to place his faith in young rookie, Davey Campbell - "the next George Best". Back home, Tommy waits anxiously for the biggest day of his life - because the day of the match is also his tenth birthday - and his father has promised to take him to the "top of the World" - the massive crane at Belfast Docks where Arthur works. From here he can see the whole of his world, but can he understand the lessons his father, inspired by the Greek philosopher Socrates, is trying to teach him? This is a story of two nations, two teams, and a father and a son, the things that divide them and the things that unite us all. Set against the backdrop of the 1986 World Cup and the sociopolitical backgrounds of both nations - this is the story of the world's smallest footballing nation, taking on its best. IMDb data; ttnr: 3223394, Title: Shooting for Socrates, --- Description: Shooting for Socrates: Directed by James Erskine. With John Hannah, Conleth Hill, Richard Dormer, Art Parkinson. In November 1985, the troubled streets of Belfast are torn up by rioting yet again. In amongst the angry mob, we find nine year old Tommy, nonchalantly dribbling a ball through the insanity. Whilst politicians argue over the peace process, there's only one thing on young Tommy's football-mad mind - the forthcoming World Cup, where Northern Ireland will take on Brazil. For the South American giants it's just another step on the path to inevitable global domination, yet for Northern Ireland, and young Tommy, it's the biggest game of their lives. They are two countries that couldn't seem further apart: Northern Ireland, with its Orange men and Republican curbstones, the Rev'd Ian Paisley and Fergal Sharkey; and Brazil with its carnival, its Samba, with Pelé and the 'beautiful game'. On the football field, eccentric Northern Ireland coach Billy Bingham (they call him Mr FIFA - "a fee for this and a fee for that") must plug together a bunch of misfits and third divisioners. Brazil are led by none other than the philosopher-captain (Dr.) Sócrates, who has, in part, inspired the collapse of his country's ruthless military junta, and they are the hot favourites to scoop up football's ultimate prize. As bunting replaces bombs on the streets of Belfast, and Catholic and Protestants alike turn their attention to the big match, Tommy's dockworker turned philosopher father Arthur uses his son's passion for football to enlighten him on the events that make up his chaotic world. The story interweaves young Tommy's coming of age tale with the trials and travails of the hapless Northern Irish team over the nine months leading up to their ultimate game, in the stifling heat of Mexico at the world's greatest festival of football. As the hours tick down to the ultimate battle, with his lead striker crocked, Bingham is forced to place his faith in young rookie, Davey Campbell - "the next George Best". Back home, Tommy waits anxiously for the biggest day of his life - because the day of the match is also his tenth birthday - and his father has promised to take him to the "top of the World" - the massive crane at Belfast Docks where Arthur works. From here he can see the whole of his world, but can he understand the lessons his father, inspired by the Greek philosopher Socrates, is trying to teach him? This is a story of two nations, two teams, and a father and a son, the things that divide them and the things that unite us all. Set against the backdrop of the 1986 World Cup and the sociopolitical backgrounds of both nations - this is the story of the world's smallest footballing nation, taking on its best. With laughter and passion, this is the ultimate story of the beautiful game and what it means." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3223394/","name":"Shooting for Socrates","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxNDIyMzIzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTc3MDc5NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In November 1985, the troubled streets of Belfast are torn up by rioting yet again. programme.title: Mermaids
Syreny
Mermaids
programme.desc:
Mermaids: Directed by Richard Benjamin. With Cher, Bob Hoskins, Winona Ryder, Michael Schoeffling. An unconventional single mother relocates with her two daughters to a small Massachusetts town in 1963, where a number of events and relationships both challenge and strengthen their familial bonds." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0100140/","name":"Mermaids","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTRiNjIwYjAtZWZmNC00Y2ZmLTk3ODgtMTBmNDRlYzNiOGQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzc5MjA3OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An unconventional single mother relocates with her two daughters to a small Massachusetts town in 1963, where a number of events and relationships both challenge and strengthen their familial bonds.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0100140/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"budmassey"},"dateCreated":"2001-03-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"A magic potion!","reviewBody":"A delightful period piece set appropriately in 1963. Appropriate because Charlotte (Wynona Ryder), like the nation, is about to shed a little of her innocence and face some difficult realities. Cher, Ryder and an adorably young Christina Ricci are perfect as a single parent family. Cher, in her best work ever, including Moonstruck, is a free-spirited mom who only cooks finger food because anything else is too much of a commitment. Ryder, who narrates the film from her character's perspective, is a high school student who, despite her fervent wish to lead a devout life, falls in love with the local handyman. Ricci is the youngest, a champion swimmer who steals the whole movie with scenes like her pumpkin scene. (Watch it and you'll know what I'm talking about. It's unforgettable.) Bob Hoskins is hilarious as the shoe salesman who falls head over heels for Cher, family and all.

Set in coastal Massachusetts, the scenery is breathtaking, and the idyllic depiction of life in a small town in the last days of American innocence is dead on. Director Richard Benjamin, who also gave us such charming films as Milk Money and My Stepmother is an Alien, rivals Penny Marshall and Rob Reiner with this gem.

This film is perfection, an absolute 10. It's a magic potion that can make me laugh and feel good even on the worst day. I sometimes wish I could step inside a la Pleasantville and stay there.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":30462,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1990-12-14","keywords":"single mother,swimming pool,year 1964,female protagonist,teenage girl","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4065770265","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2I5MmM5YzAtOGYxZS00Y2YxLWIxZjUtMTliNjFkNGFlODNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXJoYW5uYWg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2I5MmM5YzAtOGYxZS00Y2YxLWIxZjUtMTliNjFkNGFlODNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXJoYW5uYWg@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000333/","name":"Cher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001364/","name":"Bob Hoskins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000213/","name":"Winona Ryder"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000907/","name":"Richard Benjamin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0001995/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0200351/","name":"Patty Dann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0731293/","name":"June Roberts"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: After the Dark
Filozofowie
The Philosophers
programme.desc: After the Dark: Directed by John Huddles. With James D'Arcy, Sophie Lowe, Daryl Sabara, Freddie Stroma. At an international school in Jakarta, a philosophy teacher challenges his class of twenty graduating seniors to choose which ten of them would take shelter underground and reboot the human race in the event of a nuclear apocalypse." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1928340/","name":"After the Dark","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyNjY4MjM1OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQyNzE4MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"At an international school in Jakarta, a philosophy teacher challenges his class of twenty graduating seniors to choose which ten of them would take shelter underground and reboot the human race in the event of a nuclear apocalypse.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1928340/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Nikar4"},"dateCreated":"2014-01-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Lazy Sunday Watch this","reviewBody":"I admit this wasn't exactly as exciting and fast paced as the trailer suggested but I still really enjoyed it. While everyone seems to be slating the film for its explanation of philosophy I think they are missing the point. Personally I believe the film is more about human nature and how in essence we are emotional creatures. Here is a tutor arguing about logical choices and not allowing emotion to guide you when in the end it is revealed the whole exercise was created as his emotional reaction to something. I cant say much more without spoiling it for those who haven't seen it. I would definitely recommend this to others. I would call this a Sunday afternoon film, it does all the thinking for you but you can still enjoy the ride.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21974,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2013-10-10","keywords":"philosophy,gay character,voting,group decision making,teacher","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"After the Dark","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2278733849","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWEyZGU0YTktYTIyZC00Mzk1LWJiZDctZDc0NzA4Njg3NDM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWEyZGU0YTktYTIyZC00Mzk1LWJiZDctZDc0NzA4Njg3NDM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for After the Dark"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0195439/","name":"James D'Arcy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2998321/","name":"Sophie Lowe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0754512/","name":"Daryl Sabara"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0399655/","name":"John Huddles"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0308344/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129628/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0518649/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0399655/","name":"John Huddles"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Moguls
Mgła
The Fog
programme.desc: The Moguls: Directed by Michael Traeger. With Jeff Bridges, Tim Blake Nelson, Joe Pantoliano, Ted Danson. Citizens of a small town, under the influence of a man in the midst of a mid-life crisis, come together to make an adult film." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0405163/","name":"The Moguls","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYyNzQyOTQzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTYxNjQzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Citizens of a small town, under the influence of a man in the midst of a mid-life crisis, come together to make an adult film.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0405163/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bgpetrarca"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"How could you not like this movie?","reviewBody":"For those of you in search of a movie that will make you laugh, here is your pick. I have read comments from users saying that this movie "didn't seem real" or "wasn't believable". To you, I ask: What did you think you were watching? I saw this screening at the Newport Film Festival and thought it was amazing. Some movies (gasp) are out there to entertain and this does just that... fantastically. It is a story that laughs at the ups and downs of the human experience while portraying the sometimes very harsh reality of middle-class struggle. It gives us a story we recognize to a certain extent, but garnishes it with a great variety of endearing characters. As an example the group of "guys" has a wonderfully accepted gay guy who asked the guys to call him MOOSE. (played oh-so-well by Ted Danson) We see the standard group of small town guys, going nowhere with their lives, yet they aren't the stereotypical unrelatable morons of modern day cinema; They, in a very round about and strange way, have morals and try to do well in life, despite their position. Go see this movie... it is a wonderful treat and a great time at the theatre.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6326,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-04-28","keywords":"small town,loser,adult filmmaking,pornographic film,hot","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Amateurs","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2207580441","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmJkZDkwNzktZDNiMS00NzFhLThhYTktM2FhZDg5ODQ2ZjcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmJkZDkwNzktZDNiMS00NzFhLThhYTktM2FhZDg5ODQ2ZjcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for The Amateurs"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000313/","name":"Jeff Bridges"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001101/","name":"Ted Danson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001592/","name":"Joe Pantoliano"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870592/","name":"Michael Traeger"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010508/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102795/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0107069/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870592/","name":"Michael Traeger"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Cooties
Szkolna zaraza
Cooties
programme.desc:
Cooties: Directed by Jonathan Milott, Cary Murnion. With Elijah Wood, Rainn Wilson, Alison Pill, Jack McBrayer. A mysterious virus hits an isolated elementary school, transforming the kids into a feral swarm of mass savages. An unlikely hero must lead a motley band of teachers in the fight of their lives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2490326/","name":"Cooties","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA4MTM5NzExMjBeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDYyNTk1OTUx._V1_.jpg","description":"A mysterious virus hits an isolated elementary school, transforming the kids into a feral swarm of mass savages. An unlikely hero must lead a motley band of teachers in the fight of their lives.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2490326/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"HorrorOverEverything"},"dateCreated":"2015-09-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Little Disappointing But Still An Entertaining Horror Comedy","reviewBody":"So I went into this with fairly high expectations. I love horror/comedies and this one looked very promising, funny premise, great cast, and zombies (who doesn't love zombies?). It wasn't a bad movie by any means but it did let me down a little bit.

First off the main thing that killed my buzz with this was how unlikable Elijah Wood's character was, I get that they were doing this on purpose but the scenes with him in them just made me get more and more irritated with his character. It's not that Wood did a bad job or anything, it's just that some of the lines that were written for his character were almost cringe worthy bad. That character however was more than made up for by how awesome Rainn Wilson's character was, some of his lines were gold.

A lot of the jokes were great, I found myself laughing out loud multiple times, but some of them just fell short and didn't really work at all. For the most part though the humor works well and helps to move along the movie. I think the main thing that really kept this movie from being great is that the Horror concept of it kind of gets put on the back burner to the comedy in too many scenes. I really wish they would have thrown more horror elements in. There are far too many scenes of the survivors just sitting in various rooms of the school trading mediocre-pretty decent dialogue.

Overall this wasn't bad, in fact it was a good movie. I was entertained and had a fun time watching it. But it could have used a bit more gore and horror and a little less mediocre jokes. Still a good ride though.

6.5/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":25138,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Horror"],"datePublished":"2015-09-18","keywords":"cannibalism,child burning,co worker co worker relationship,school,colleague colleague relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1659678745","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA3MjE1MzU5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTIwNDY3NTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA3MjE1MzU5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTIwNDY3NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A mysterious virus hits an isolated elementary school, transforming the kids into a feral swarm of mass savages. programme.title: Pitch Black
Pitch Black
programme.desc:
Pitch Black: Directed by David Twohy. With Vin Diesel, Radha Mitchell, Cole Hauser, Keith David. A commercial transport ship and its crew are marooned on a planet full of bloodthirsty creatures that only come out to feast at night. But then, they learn that a month-long eclipse is about to occur." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0134847/","name":"Pitch Black","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTNmYzE1OWYtZDdjNC00OTdhLTg1YjUtYWJlZTVkMzkzNmVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A commercial transport ship and its crew are marooned on a planet full of bloodthirsty creatures that only come out to feast at night. But then, they learn that a month-long eclipse is about to occur.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0134847/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mstomaso"},"dateCreated":"2006-09-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Relentless and gorgeous sci-fi action film","reviewBody":"Let me waste a moment of your time to explain how I approached this film. 1st I dismissed the trailers out of hand because the film appeared to be an uncredited remake of Aliens, which I consider to be one of the weakest films in the Alien series. Stupidly continuing to dismiss the film after I heard positive things about it from people whose opinions I trust, I missed the theatrical run completely. I then became hooked on Farscape, in its 3rd or 4th season at the time, and found Pitch Black on cable one night around bed time - so I said "oh why not, at least it has Claudia Black in it." Soon, I recognized Keith David, and began to realize that Vin Diesel, Radha Mitchell and Cole Hauser could all act (why this should surprise me, I do not know). I was captivated. I have now remained captivated for four years. I just watched the film for the 3rd or 4th time, and I still love it.

This is not an art film, not an independent, and its not entirely original, but where it fails to break a lot of new ground, it utterly succeeds in providing interesting, realistic characters, hard-driving action in the medium of a compelling but simple plot, and non-stop entertainment; an absolutely beautiful environment with tastefully rendered special effects. Sound to good to be true? Don't take my word for it... see it for yourself.

The film also highlighted the charisma of the now somewhat iconoclastic Vin Diesel, introducing the character of Richard Riddick. Diesel would go on to star in the somewhat Riddick-ulous Chronicles thereof (which I also enjoyed, though recognizing its rather huge flaws) and is now something of a legend. Diesel is so charismatic, so big, and so interesting to watch that it is easy to ignore the fact that he is not only a talented actor, but a smart one too. Checking out the DVD version of Pitch Black, with the audio comments on might just blow you away.

The film is about the crew of an inter-system transport ship stranded on an unknown planet after a crash-landing in which their captain was killed. The new commander is inexperienced but bright and heroic (Mitchell), but she is caught between two dominant and dangerous personalities - a bounty hunter with secrets (Hauser) and a dangerous criminal who has been surgically altered to see in the dark (Diesel). Is that all? Of course not - the planet is inhabited, and the inhabitants are hungry.

As unoriginal and improbable as some of this may be, Pitch Black is beautifully filmed, well told, and very nicely performed. Don't expect to learn anything, and don't expect to have to think a whole lot, but do expect to have fun with this modern sci-fi action classic.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":232514,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2000-02-18","keywords":"darkness,desert,eclipse,survival,spaceship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Pitch Black","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi15073561","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWJiYzFiZDMtZTUwZi00ZWVlLTg1OTQtODA3NWQ4MDIwNjJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWJiYzFiZDMtZTUwZi00ZWVlLTg1OTQtODA3NWQ4MDIwNjJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593664/","name":"Radha Mitchell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0369513/","name":"Cole Hauser"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004874/","name":"Vin Diesel"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878638/","name":"David Twohy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030612/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031772/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0923646/","name":"Jim Wheat"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003117/","name":"Ken Wheat"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878638/","name":"David Twohy"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Intruders
Intruders
programme.desc:
Intruders: Directed by Juan Carlos Fresnadillo. With Clive Owen, Carice van Houten, Daniel Brühl, Pilar López de Ayala. Two children living in different countries are visited nightly by a faceless being who wants to take possession of them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1634121/","name":"Intruders","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1ODQ4NTIyOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzIwOTUzNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two children living in different countries are visited nightly by a faceless being who wants to take possession of them.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1634121/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2012-10-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Spanish/British horror story about a desperate father who attempts to free his daughter from his deathly grip .","reviewBody":"Intruders is a horror tale of possession in which two children in two different countries are visited by the Hollow Face man who spreads fear across the globe . There's a spooky faceless monster that has been haunting the daughter of John Farrow (Clive Owen). This figure wants to steal her face as she feels he has no identity of his own . John's tried helping his daughter remedy the situation, but each night she still gets a visit from this unwelcomed friend. Things get even spookier once John sees this faceless creature. He's not sure if he's going completely crazy or not, so he installs a security camera . Though no one can see him , Hollow Face lurks in the corners, desperately desiring love but only knowing how to spread fear and hate. He creeps into the life of John Farrow after Farrow's beloved 13-year-old daughter Mia (Ella Purnell) is assaulted in their home . The line between the real and the imaginary blurs as fissures start to open within the family unit . It seems that no security measure can keep Hollow Face out . Furthermore we're initially introduced to Juan (Izán Corchero) a young Spanish boy who, on one rainy night, is attacked by a strange spectre , known as Hollow face , being helped by his mother (Pilar Gomez Ayala) . 

The picture displays mystery, suspense, shocks, grisly terror and eerie scenes when the horrific creature appears . From start to finish the terror and spooky scenes are continuous until a striking ending . The film contains horrifying and hair rising images and a sinister, mysterious atmosphere . It has a couple of twists piled on top of one central twist concerning two children in different countries who are visited nightly by a faceless being and menaced by what seems to be a supernatural presence . Good performance by Clive Owen who stars as John Farrow, a father trying to protect his 13-year-old daughter from the evil entity known as Hollow Face . The acting from Clive Owen , Carice van Houten as his wife , Daniel Bruhl as a priest , Kerry Fox as a Doctor , Hector Alterio as an old priest is much better than the script . Nicolás Casariego and Jaime Marques' screenplay does something strange by the end : it actually removes the stakes of everything that came before with its trio of revelations that at first test and then demolish any credulity the movie had built up by that point. Both of whom manage to create some interest with their dual storytelling style . However , the picture is hampered by a partially fleshed out story that is mostly lacking in horror. Director Fresnadillo throws all of that away in exchange for a terror film without scares, originality or a pulse . Colorful cinematography plenty of lights and shades by excellent cameraman Enrique Chediak . Creepy and thrilling music adjusted to the horror film by Roque Baños . 

Director Juan Carlos Fresnadillo (Intacto , 28 Weeks Later) isn't exactly a visionary director like the film bills him as, but he is good at approaching films with style and consistent moods . The director made an editing the film was a big challenge , it was a long, complex process because of the story's dual structure. The film will appeal to terror buffs but gets some decent scares with the apparition of the frightening faceless being who wants to take possession of the children.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20552,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Fantasy","Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2011-10-07","keywords":"supernatural horror,one word title,breasts,climbing a tree,flashlight","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi758030617","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQyMTI4Mzg1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzIzMjgyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQyMTI4Mzg1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzIzMjgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two children living in different countries are visited nightly by a faceless being who wants to take possession of them. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654110/","name":"Clive Owen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0396924/","name":"Carice van Houten"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3665621/","name":"Izán Corchero"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0294379/","name":"Juan Carlos Fresnadillo"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0224298/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0287460/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071913/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0143006/","name":"Nicolás Casariego"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0549954/","name":"Jaime Marques"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

Director Juan Carlos Fresnadillo (Intacto , 28 Weeks Later) isn't exactly a visionary director like the film bills him as, but he is good at approaching films with style and consistent moods . The film will appeal to terror buffs but gets some decent scares with the apparition of the frightening faceless being who wants to take possession of the children.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20552,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Fantasy","Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2011-10-07","keywords":"supernatural horror,one word title,breasts,climbing a tree,flashlight","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi758030617","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQyMTI4Mzg1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzIzMjgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQyMTI4Mzg1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzIzMjgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two children living in different countries are visited nightly by a faceless being who wants to take possession of them. programme.title: A Kind of Murder
Sposób na morderstwo
A Kind of Murder
programme.desc:
A Kind of Murder: Directed by Andy Goddard. With Patrick Wilson, Jessica Biel, Haley Bennett, Eddie Marsan. In 1960s New York, Walter Stackhouse is a successful architect married to the beautiful Clara who leads a seemingly perfect life. But his fascination with an unsolved murder leads him into a spiral of chaos as he is forced to play cat-and-mouse with a clever killer and an overambitious detective, while at the same time lusting after another woman." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2726552/","name":"A Kind of Murder","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAwNDA1NjcwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY0MDA2MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1960s New York, Walter Stackhouse is a successful architect married to the beautiful Clara who leads a seemingly perfect life. But his fascination with an unsolved murder leads him into a spiral of chaos as he is forced to play ca","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2726552/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"randymcbeast"},"dateCreated":"2016-12-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hints of De Palma but then the story ends up going nowhere","reviewBody":"This was a beautifully shot film and at points I thought I was watching a Brian De Palma film, but all of that went out south in the last ten minutes.

The story had built up nicely and I was salivating at the prospect of a wild twist of an ending. The cast and the acting were all top notch and it held up nicely as the period piece it intended to be, but then things started going haywire and it all just fell apart.

It really seemed as if the movie perhaps ran out of money in the budget and then they just slapped together some incoherent garbage and called it a day. There has to be some explanation. I mean, the first hour plus of the movie was really well done so what the heck happened? In 1960s New York, Walter Stackhouse is a successful architect married to the beautiful Clara who leads a seemingly perfect life. But his fascination with an unsolved murder leads him into a spiral of chaos as he is forced to play cat-and-mouse with a clever killer and an overambitious detective, while at the same time lusting after another woman." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2726552/","name":"A Kind of Murder","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAwNDA1NjcwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY0MDA2MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1960s New York, Walter Stackhouse is a successful architect married to the beautiful Clara who leads a seemingly perfect life. But his fascination with an unsolved murder leads him into a spiral of chaos as he is forced to play ca","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2726552/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"randymcbeast","dateCreated":"2016-12-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hints of De Palma but then the story ends up going nowhere","reviewBody":"This was a beautifully shot film and at points I thought I was watching a Brian De Palma film, but all of that went out south in the last ten minutes.

The story had built up nicely and I was salivating at the prospect of a wild twist of an ending. The cast and the acting were all top notch and it held up nicely as the period piece it intended to be, but then things started going haywire and it all just fell apart.

It really seemed as if the movie perhaps ran out of money in the budget and then they just slapped together some incoherent garbage and called it a day. There has to be some explanation. I mean, the first hour plus of the movie was really well done so what the heck happened? programme.title: Zadanie specjalne
programme.desc: 20-letni Neal (James Marsden) poznaje tajemniczego O.W. Granta (Gary Oldman), który może spełnić jedno marzenie każdego człowieka. Dzięki niemu trafia do ekscentrycznego Raya, który zleca mu tajną misję. Neal ma wyruszyć do nieistniejącego miasta, drogą, której nie ma na żadnej mapie, by dostarczyć klientowi przesyłkę o nieznanej zawartości. Ma nadzieję, że podczas podróży znajdzie swoją wymarzoną dziewczynę.

programme.title: Interstate 60: Episodes of the Road
Ale jazda!
Interstate 60: Episodes of the Road
programme.desc:
Interstate 60: Episodes of the Road: Directed by Bob Gale. With Matthew Edison, Paul Brogren, Wayne Robson, Gary Oldman. Neal Oliver, a very confused young man and an artist, takes a journey of a lifetime on a highway I60 that doesn't exist on any of the maps, going to the places he never even heard of, searching for an answer and his dreamgirl." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0165832/","name":"Interstate 60: Episodes of the Road","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYwYzlhOTAtNDAwMC00ZTBhLWI4M2QtMTA1NmJhYTdiNTkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTM0NTU5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Neal Oliver, a very confused young man and an artist, takes a journey of a lifetime on a highway I60 that doesn't exist on any of the maps, going to the places he never even heard of, searching for an answer and his dreamgirl.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0165832/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"scooterbrowne"},"dateCreated":"2004-01-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Say What You Mean and Mean What You Say (Possible Spoilers)","reviewBody":"From the man, Bob Gale, that gave us the Back to The Future trilogy comes Interstate 60. A story that everyone can pretty much relate to.

Well I say that this is one of the best movies that I have ever seen and I mean that 100%. This movie relates so much to life and shows you the results of the decisions that you make.

I waited so long to see this that I marked on my calender the day it would come out on DVD so I could go rent it at my local video store. When I first started watching it I wasn't to sure about it but by the time it was over I was sitting there amazed that a movie this good couldn't find distribution for so long and had to be put out as a direct to video release, especially with all the crap being put out at the theaters. I also couldn't wait to watch it again so I went out and bought it.

I thought the story was really good though I think the language was over the top. To me this movie was basically what everyone goes through in life. Finding that dream girl/guy, drugs, pressure from a parent/guardian,and wanting an answer to life.

The actors did a great job and Chris Cooper was hysterical. Amy Smart was hilarious when first introduced and Christopher Lloyd reminded me of his character in the Back to The Future movies.

If you need to see a thought provoking non-stop fun movie then please hop in your car and take the road less traveled down Interstate 60.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":31453,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2003-09-10","keywords":"road trip,alternate reality,magic 8 ball,road movie,time warp","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Teaser Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3079324441","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjg3NjM3NDEtMzJiMi00MTgxLTk0ZTEtNDc4OTU5N2M0ODkyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjg3NjM3NDEtMzJiMi00MTgxLTk0ZTEtNDc4OTU5N2M0ODkyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"Neal Oliver, a very confused young man and an artist, takes a journey of a lifetime on a highway I60 that doesn't exist on any of the maps, going to the places he never even heard of, searching for an answer and his dreamgirl."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005188/","name":"James Marsden"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000198/","name":"Gary Oldman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000621/","name":"Kurt Russell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0301826/","name":"Bob Gale"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022335/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040305/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0039180/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0301826/","name":"Bob Gale"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="
