Red Lights
programme.desc: Red Lights: Directed by Rodrigo Cortés. With Cillian Murphy, Sigourney Weaver, Robert De Niro, Toby Jones. Psychologist Margaret Matheson and her assistant study paranormal activity, which leads them to investigate a world-renowned psychic who has resurfaced years after his toughest critic mysteriously passed away." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1748179/","name":"Red Lights","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzMjYwNTc2M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTY0Mjc4Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Psychologist Margaret Matheson and her assistant study paranormal activity, which leads them to investigate a world-renowned psychic who has resurfaced years after his toughest critic mysteriously passed away.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1748179/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"karmaswimswami"},"dateCreated":"2014-06-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Energetic, accessible, engrossing","reviewBody":"Rodrigo Cortes has all the makings of an auteur. "Red Lights" really puts the hook in viewers, and is hard to stop watching once it gets going. You get the feeling Cortes is quite enthusiastic, just dying to tell you this yarn. His script is well-written, intelligent, and never bamboozles. Elisabeth Olsen is incandescent, and the performances from all the leads have them in top form. Some may criticize the film as being overproduced: many sequences are bursting forth with camera angles and takes, and these combined with Cortes's fulminating style of editing sometimes give the film the feel of "Desperate Hours." But I loved this film, loved the color palette, loved the patois and exposition, and admire Cortes's confident bombast. Great things are coming from this filmmaker.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":60338,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2012-03-02","keywords":"psychic,revelation,obsession,younger version of character,road trip","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3842417177","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjQ4NzcyNTYwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTc5ODg4MjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjQ4NzcyNTYwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTc5ODg4MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Psychologist Margaret Matheson and her assistant study paranormal activity, which leads them to investigate a world-renowned psychic who has resurfaced years after his toughest critic mysteriously passed away. programme.title: The Usual Suspects
Podejrzani
The Usual Suspects
programme.desc:
The Usual Suspects: Directed by Bryan Singer. With Stephen Baldwin, Gabriel Byrne, Benicio Del Toro, Kevin Pollak. A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0114814/","name":"The Usual Suspects","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTViNjMyNmUtNDFkNC00ZDRlLThmMDUtZDU2YWE4NGI2ZjVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0114814/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"illbebackreviews"},"dateCreated":"2013-02-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"At first, wasn't the biggest fan but.....","reviewBody":"I couldn't help but set rather high expectations for 'The Usual Suspects' as I went into watching this. I knew this was no action movie or any of the crap we get nowadays. This was true cinema! I was excited 'The Usual Suspects' is a mystery film about what cargo was on board the ship when it was destroyed and the events leading up to it as we are told from the only known survivor of that accident.

Around 45-50 minutes into the movie, I was starting to find myself a bit tired and thought the movie may perhaps have dragged along just a bit. I was becoming rather disappointed. Then the film truly began to change in such a way that I find it rather hard to explain. The characters began to get a little more entertaining, the pacing certainly began to pick up, the dialogue was getting more interesting and overall, I was more excited.

Then comes the amazing final twenty minutes with the plot twist and the story finally closing in perfectly, making the story more understandable. However, the final 5 minutes of the movie are some of the best moments of movie ever made and that is the ultimate plot twist which surprised the hell out of me! It was a cheering end to what ended as a great movie and a movie I would be more than happy to check out again and again! A-","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1035960,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"1995-08-16","keywords":"surprise ending,criminal mastermind,criminal,suspect,unreliable narrator","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Usual Suspects","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2717188377","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmI2NTk3ODQtYWFiNC00NDgxLTkxY2UtYTNhNTI3YTNkNzdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmI2NTk3ODQtYWFiNC00NDgxLTkxY2UtYTNhNTI3YTNkNzdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Gramercy Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000228/","name":"Kevin Spacey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000321/","name":"Gabriel Byrne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001590/","name":"Chazz Palminteri"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001741/","name":"Bryan Singer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106129/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033402/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0082030/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003160/","name":"Christopher McQuarrie"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Hollows Grove: Directed by Craig Efros. With Mykelti Williamson, Lance Henriksen, Matthew Carey, Sunkrish Bala. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 6782276, Title: The Padre, --- Description: The Padre: Directed by Jonathan Sobol. With Tim Roth, Nick Nolte, Luis Guzmán, Juana Arboleda. Retired Judge Randall and his hired gun, Gaspar, track down a con man posing as a priest in a small Colombian town only to be thrown off-course by a scrappy 16-year-old girl intent on reuniting with her sister in the United States." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6782276/","name":"The Padre","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmRiZTBmMGYtZjQwMy00NmJlLWE2ZDktZTA3MWU2MDcwMDViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQ3MTUzMjA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Retired Judge Randall and his hired gun, Gaspar, track down a con man posing as a priest in a small Colombian town only to be thrown off-course by a scrappy 16-year-old girl intent on reuniting with her sister in the United States.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6782276/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"larrys3","dateCreated":"2018-10-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Lacks Dramatic Tension & Suspense","reviewBody":"Set in Colombia, Tim Roth portrays a pickpocket and conman disguised as a padre, as he tries to escape the pursuing ex-Marshal Nick Nolte, who believes Roth was responsible for the death of his pregnant daughter. Nolte has hired Luis Guzman, a local police officer, to help him in this pursuit and to smooth things over when Nolte disrespects the local populace or their customs. Finally, Valeria Henriquez is quite engaging as the young charmer Lena, who is desperate to join her sister in Minnesota (sold online to a family when they were both in a church orphanage) and will even team up with the "padre" to get there.\n\nWith this good cast and storyline I guess I expected more from this movie, but it lacked dramatic tension and suspense and came across as too flat-toned. Overall, it just never seemed to gel into anything substantial, as I see it.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1515,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-28","keywords":"girl","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Padre","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi181189401","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWI4NzM0OGEtY2ZhMi00MmY4LWExZGEtOWYzYWQ0MTYzZWZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWI4NzM0OGEtY2ZhMi00MmY4LWExZGEtOWYzYWQ0MTYzZWZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000619/","name":"Tim Roth","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000560/","name":"Nick Nolte","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0350079/","name":"Luis Guzmán"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1038286/","name":"Jonathan Sobol"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0133523/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053578/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3127634/","name":"Stephen Kunc"],"duration":"PT1H38M"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Jonathan Sobol

programme.title: The Outpost
The Outpost
programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 3833480, Title: The Outpost, --- Description: The Outpost: Created by Jason Faller, Kynan Griffin. With Jessica Green, Jake Stormoen, Anand Desai-Barochia, Adam Johnson. Talon, the lone survivor of the Blackbloods, sets off to track her family's killers, and discovers her supernatural powers, which she must learn to harness." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7612548/","name":"The Outpost","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTVhYTRmZWEtODcxZS00OWY5LTg4NzQtMmY2ZjBlYmEyMzMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Talon, the lone survivor of the Blackbloods, sets off to track her family's killers, and discovers her supernatural powers, which she must learn to harness.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7612548/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"amisanthropiccurmudgeon","dateCreated":"2018-07-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Worth giving a chance","reviewBody":"I plan of giving this show a chance to see if it can entertain me. It has possibilities. While it may not for everyone, I had a good time watching it. This is a TV show for people that enjoy reading. I don't mean that in the way the people say I have a face for radio. I mean it in the way that some people just like to be entertained by a good story rather than be awed by something more spectacular than the last spectacle they saw. I will be honest. From what I've seen so far there doesn't appear to be anything new or revolutionary about the story or its production. It's starting out as a classic revenge (or search for justice) tale in a somewhat familiar swords and sorcery fantasy setting. The important word though is "classic". It's classic for a reason. People like these stories. They're a little bit escapism and a little bit like comfort food. In the end, unlike the real world, you're pretty sure the villain is going to get their just desserts. What you tune in to watch for is the path that the story takes to get there. Unlike, some high-end productions this one doesn't let your own imagination atrophy by showing you every minute detail of its world and its inhabitants right from the beginning. It's not spending its budget on making sure you get to see the muscles of the Grey-skins flex as they crush the bones of their victims. It's enough that you know the the Grey-skins are dangerous. They appear to be concentrating their resources on the story and the actors that bring that story to life. Important points are revealed as the story unfolds and others are be left to the imaginations of viewers that still have one. I will admit that in my youth, I played Dungeons & Dragons and other RPGs. The settings, the stories, the characters even the tropes are all very familiar to me and I still enjoy them. I enjoyed the first episode and I'm curious to see what happens in the next.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7435,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-07-10","keywords":"witch,the cw,magic,warrior queen,medieval fantasy","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4880301/","name":"Jessica Green","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3940484/","name":"Jake Stormoen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3652548/","name":"Anand Desai-Barochia"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0337558/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0735391/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003899/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131306/","name":"Jason Faller","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1344786/","name":"Kynan Griffin"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Outpost Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3940465433","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWY5MjJiOGMtMWNkZi00NDQ5LWIyZGEtY2RlNWJlNTBhYWQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWY5MjJiOGMtMWNkZi00NDQ5LWIyZGEtY2RlNWJlNTBhYWQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Milan Todorovic, Kurt Knight, Orsi Nagypal, Marc Roskin, John Lyde

programme.title: Extraterrestrial
Extraterrestrial
programme.desc: Extraterrestrial: Directed by Colin Minihan. With Brittany Allen, Freddie Stroma, Melanie Papalia, Jesse Moss. A group of friends on a weekend trip to a cabin in the woods find themselves terrorized by alien visitors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2960930/","name":"Extraterrestrial","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ0MjUwNzQ3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzk2NTY3MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of friends on a weekend trip to a cabin in the woods find themselves terrorized by alien visitors.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2960930/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"SushiStoner103"},"dateCreated":"2015-01-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Watching This Film Is An Easy Way To Get Anally Probed","reviewBody":"Now before I start I am a huge fan of alien conspiracy horror flicks and after my first viewing of (grave encounters) 2011 I had high expectation from the "vicious brothers". This film is directed and edited by them and I was seeking for some effective scares. The first act was very formulaic, a group of teenagers decide to spend the weekend at a cabin in the woods now already I am disappointed. The dialogue was moronic along with the characters it is impossible to describe their stupidity as they continue to make poor choices within the situations. It got to the point where I became angry and annoyed but that eventually cooled off after the second act where the exceptional character development finally kicked in, I must agree there were a few cool scenes here and there but the film fails to provide any scares or intelligence within the plot. But during the third act the film explores inside of the spaceship and extends a little on the experimentations the aliens perform on the humans, which is exactly what any alien fan wanted to see, although there were a few scenes that left me confused weather to think this film is a horror or a comedy. After I gave this film a chance it started dosing off to a romantic thriller with the characters apologising and showing affection for each other again, and from that moment the whole film managed to collapse. My expectations were destroyed and the film itself remains a mystery since nothing really makes much sense. I would of appreciated more of an appearance of the aliens and a functioning plot, likable characters and classic "vicious brothers" scares. IMDb data; ttnr: 2960930, Title: Extraterrestrial, --- Description: Extraterrestrial: Directed by Colin Minihan. With Brittany Allen, Freddie Stroma, Melanie Papalia, Jesse Moss. A group of friends on a weekend trip to a cabin in the woods find themselves terrorized by alien visitors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2960930/","name":"Extraterrestrial","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ0MjUwNzQ3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzk2NTY3MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of friends on a weekend trip to a cabin in the woods find themselves terrorized by alien visitors.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2960930/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"SushiStoner103","dateCreated":"2015-01-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Watching This Film Is An Easy Way To Get Anally Probed","reviewBody":"Now before I start I am a huge fan of alien conspiracy horror flicks and after my first viewing of (grave encounters) 2011 I had high expectation from the "vicious brothers". This film is directed and edited by them and I was seeking for some effective scares. The first act was very formulaic, a group of teenagers decide to spend the weekend at a cabin in the woods now already I am disappointed. The dialogue was moronic along with the characters it is impossible to describe their stupidity as they continue to make poor choices within the situations. It got to the point where I became angry and annoyed but that eventually cooled off after the second act where the exceptional character development finally kicked in, I must agree there were a few cool scenes here and there but the film fails to provide any scares or intelligence within the plot. But during the third act the film explores inside of the spaceship and extends a little on the experimentations the aliens perform on the humans, which is exactly what any alien fan wanted to see, although there were a few scenes that left me confused weather to think this film is a horror or a comedy. After I gave this film a chance it started dosing off to a romantic thriller with the characters apologising and showing affection for each other again, and from that moment the whole film managed to collapse. My expectations were destroyed and the film itself remains a mystery since nothing really makes much sense. I would of appreciated more of an appearance of the aliens and a functioning plot, likable characters and classic "vicious brothers" scares. I will recommend this film to anyone who will watch with an open mind because watching this and expecting it to be the next alien will leave you vastly dissatisfied.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":15448,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5,"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Action","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2014-10-17","keywords":"alien abduction,no survivors,videotape,vietnam war veteran,military cover up","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi377794329","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODMyNzM4OTk3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDgxNDE4MjE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODMyNzM4OTk3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDgxNDE4MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of friends on a weekend trip to a cabin in the woods find themselves terrorized by alien visitors.\r\n","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0020329/","name":"Brittany Allen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2238815/","name":"Freddie Stroma","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1536605/","name":"Jesse Moss"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4017355/","name":"Colin Minihan"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0447381/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0413004/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0452893/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4017355/","name":"Colin Minihan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3425513/","name":"Stuart Ortiz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4155547/","name":"The Vicious Brothers"],"duration":"PT1H41M"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Colin Minihan

programme.title: Fact or Faked: Auf den Spuren des Paranormalen
Fact or Faked: Auf den Spuren des Paranormalen
Oblivion
programme.desc: Vor acht Jahren musste Riker bei einer Notevakuierung wichtige Daten auf dem Planeten Nervala-4 zurücklassen. Als er nun mit einem Außenteam zurückkehrt, trifft er auf einen absolut identischen Doppelgänger. Der Mann behauptet sogar, selbst Will Riker zu sein. Es stellt sich heraus, dass der Commander durch eine Transporterfehlfunktion zweimal materialisiert wurde. Es dauert nicht lange, bis es zwischen den beiden Rikers zu Spannungen kommt.

programme.title: Fact or Faked: Auf den Spuren des Paranormalen
Fact or Faked: Auf den Spuren des Paranormalen
Dracula Untold
programme.desc: Drei Iyaaraner sind zu Gast an Bord der Enterprise und machen der Besatzung das Leben schwer. Während Counselor Troi für Botschafter Loquel allerlei kulinarische Genüsse organisieren muss, wird Worf von Botschafter Byleth ständig provoziert. Unterdessen begleitet Captain Picard Botschafter Voval in einem Shuttle auf seinen Heimatplaneten. Als sie auf dem Weg dorthin notlanden müssen, wird Voval lebensgefährlich verletzt.
